law.catch_line: The Board may modify or waive any authorization, source selection, solicitation, or contract require...
law.text:
The Board may modify or waive any authorization, source selection, solicitation, or contract requirement under this Division II for an energy performance contract or a class of energy performance contracts to the extent that:
the purposes stated in § 11-201(a) of this article are fostered; and
the circumstances of energy performance contracting require the modification or waiver.
